messages.message:
Hi python people - I'm trying to figure out if it's safe to take the readme from the response of GetTreeNodesView (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/webserver/webapp/src/py/instabase/handler/views/filesystems.py#L809) and render it with a javascript function `dangerouslySetInnerHtml`, or if I need to do additional cleaning/escaping on the frontend.

Can someone tell me if this code will make sure I don't end up introducing security vulnerabilities:
```
display_content, _ = FileDisplayBuilder().get_display_content(
            resp.tfile.content, readme_file_path)
```
